issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
<Alloy>
	<View id="mainView" opacity="1">
		<ScrollView  id="loginScroll"   >
			<Label id="aboutDisplayLabel"   />
			<View class="viewBg" layout = 'vertical'>
				<ImageView id="tourImageView"   />
				<ImageView id="videoImageView"  />
			</View>
			<Label id="memberDisplayLabel"   />
			<TextField value="" id="inputUsername"/>
			<TextField value="" id="inputPassword" returnKeyType="done"/>
			<View top="10dp" class="viewBg" layout = 'horizontal'>
				<ImageView id="forgotPasswordImageView"    />
				<ImageView id="loginImageView"/>
			</View>
		</ScrollView>
	</View>
</Alloy>
fields.summary: Android issue in Titanium SDK 3.2: Scroll view not work in side a View

comments.body: Please provide a simple but runnable test case to reproduce this issue.
Resolving this ticket as we cannot reproduce this issue and the reporter has not provided the requested test case.
